article_title: BRIEF-Toshiba says to hold extraordinary shareholders' meeting Sept 30
article_text:
Sept 7 Toshiba Corp says:

- To hold extraordinary shareholders' meeting on Sept. 30

- Board of directors to be headed by Shiseido Co adviser and ex-president Shinzo Maeda

Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
